Sun, 18 Aug 2024 08:58:14 +0000 Heavy snow on State Highway 73 at Porters Pass has closed the road trapping a number of trucks and cars. Photo / Catherine Malone
Whakatāne pedestrian critically injured after being hit by two cars was walking home from ‘family event’- sister says https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/whakatane-pedestrian-riticly-injured-after-being-hit-by-two-cars-was-walking-home-from-family-event-sister-says/ E2GGG7VG6NCOFA2RGD4GBTYNL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/whakatane-pedestrian-riticly-injured-after-being-hit-by-two-cars-was-walking-home-from-family-event-sister-says/ E2GGG7VG6NCOFA2RGD4GBTYNL4/ 'To the other people that left my brother there, I hope you get what you deserve.' Sun, 18 Aug 2024 08:41:06 +0000 The man was located seriously injured on White Pine Bush Rd shortly after midnight after being struck by two cars. Photo / Supplied

Photo / Supplied
